price: Magaalotarraa tokkollee akeekkachiisaan isaaniif jiraatu malee isaan hin balleessine.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
